product_name: oZoboards 806 Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard and Paddle - 8' 6"
long_description: Ideal for performance surfing and flatwater paddling, the 8 ft. 6 in. oZoboards 806 Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard with paddle features a soft outer skin and a 25 in. width for high maneuverability. EPS Core with triple stringers provides high strength and excellent rigidity; soft skin provides comfort for all skill levels of riders. 8 ft. 6 in. length is easy to turn in waves, and offers enough stability for flatwater exploration. Ideal for riders 175 lbs. but the oZoboards 806 Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard is rated for riders up to 250 lbs. Includes adjustable paddle.
short_description: Ideal for performance surfing and flatwater paddling, the 8 ft. 6 in. oZoboards 806 Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard with paddle features a soft outer skin and a 25 in. width for high maneuverability.
